MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string value) cil managed

Docs.param: A formatted string that contains the internal identifier, label, and path of the field
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the TaxonomyFieldValue object that is based on the specified field value.

remarks.para: The TaxonomyFieldValue object is not bound to a taxonomy field by this constructor so the and the properties will throw ArgumentExceptions when called on a TaxonomyFieldValue object that is created with this constructor. To avoid the exception, values for those fields must be set explicitly or with the methods or properties on the object.

The string passed as the parameter must be formatted either as: or . is the internal identifier of the field value in the list. is the default label of the object that is referenced by the TaxonomyField object. is a string of GUIDs delimited by a pipe (|) character and terminating in the GUID that identifies the Term: .
The delimiters in the string representation are defined by the following properties: is returned by the property, and is returned by the property.

Docs.param: A formatted string that contains the internal identifier, label, and path of the field
The TaxonomyField object that the current TaxonomyFieldValue object will bind to
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the object that is bound to the specified object and is based on the specified field value.

remarks.para: This constructor is used both when a value is retrieved from the database and when a user sets the fields value.

The string passed as the parameter must be formatted either as: or . is the internal identifier of the field value in the list. is the default label of the Term that is referenced by the TaxonomyField object. is a string of GUIDs delimited by a pipe (|) character and terminating in the GUID that identifies the term:.
The delimiters in the string representation are defined by the following properties: is returned by the property, and is returned by the property.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void PopulateFromLabelGuidPair(string text) cil managed

Docs.param: A formatted string that contains the label, path GUIDs, and term GUID.
Docs.summary: Updates the value of the object with the specified text data.

remarks.para: The parameter must be formatted as follows:. is the default object of the object that is referenced by the TaxonomyField object. consists of a string of GUIDs delimited by a pipe (|) character and terminating in the GUID that identifies the Term:.
represents the separator string returned by the property.
This method does not validate the parameter. If a string with invalid format is provided, the value of the TaxonomyFieldValue object is reset and no exception is raised.

Docs.exception: The parameter is a null reference (Nothing in Visual Basic).

Docs.summary: Gets or sets a string representing the term GUID.
Docs.value: A string representing a GUID that uniquely identifies a object.

remarks.para: If an invalid internal identifer was specified when the object was constructed, this property will return an empty string.

Docs.exception: The GUID of the Term was not specified when the TaxonomyFieldValue object was constructed and the TaxonomyFieldValue object is not bound to a object.

Public Overrides Function ToString () As String

Docs.summary: Returns a formatted string representing the object.
Docs.returns: A string that represents the TaxonomyFieldValue object.

remarks.para: The returned string consists of a label and term GUID delimited by a | character: . is the default object of the object that is referenced by the object. is the unique identifier of the Term.
The delimiter string is defined by the property.
If the TaxonomyFieldValue object does not have a value assigned, the method will return an empty string.
